title: IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT
content:
0xAC4EF23D// IsVehicleWindowIntact
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT(Vehicle vehicle, int windowIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.windowIndex: The window index.See the client-side IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT for a window indexes list.
codeBlocks:
// IsVehicleWindowIntact
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT(Vehicle vehicle, int windowIndex);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT
IsVehicleWindowIntact(vehicle, 0)
